TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WsState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Contains the values of the state of the WebSocket connection.
Docs.remarks: The WsState enumeration contains the values of the state of the WebSocket connection defined in The WebSocket API.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.WsState CLOSED = unsigned int16(3)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 3. Indicates that the connection has been closed or could not be opened.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.WsState CLOSING = unsigned int16(2)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 2. Indicates that the connection is going through the closing handshake, or the Close method has been invoked.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.WsState CONNECTING = unsigned int16(0)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 0. Indicates that the connection has not yet been established.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype WebSocketSharp.WsState OPEN = unsigned int16(1)

Docs.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 1. Indicates that the connection is established and communication is possible.
